skills.name: Forceful Arrow
skills.desc: ifRogueComboPointsEnabled()<text class='c_label'>Generate Combo Point:</text> <text class='c_resource'>1</text></br>ifADVANCED_TOOLTIP<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit Chance: </text><text class='c_resource'>40%</text></br>Fire a powerful arrow at an enemy, dealing <text class='c_number'>[0.2 * (1 + (0.1 * sLevel))]</text> damage. Every <text class='c_number'>3rd</text> cast makes the enemy <text class='c_important'><u>Vulnerable</u></text> for <text class='c_number'>0.25</text> seconds.

skills.name: Barrage
skills.desc: <text class='c_label'>Energy Cost:</text> <text class='c_resource'>30</text></br>ifADVANCED_TOOLTIP<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit Chance: </text><text class='c_resource'>16%</text></br>Unleash a barrage of <text class='c_number'>5</text> arrows that expands outwards, each dealing <text class='c_number'>[0.21 * (1 + (0.1 * sLevel))]</text> damage. Each arrow has a <text class='c_number'>20%</text> chance to ricochet off an enemy up to <text class='c_number'>1</text> time. Ricochets deal <text class='c_number'>40%</text> of the arrow's Base damage.if0.214</br></br><text class='c_important'>Combo Points</text> increase damage and arrows fired:</br><li> <text class='c_label'>1 Point:</text> <text class='c_number'>[0.21 * (1 + (0.1 * sLevel))]*(1+0.213)</text> damage, <text class='c_number'>[5+0.212]</text> arrows</br><li> <text class='c_label'>2 Points:</text> <text class='c_number'>[0.21 * (1 + (0.1 * sLevel))]*(1+(0.213*2))</text> damage, <text class='c_number'>[5+0.212*2]</text> arrows</br><li> <text class='c_label'>3 Points:</text> <text class='c_number'>[0.21 * (1 + (0.1 * sLevel))]*(1+(0.213*3))</text> damage, <text class='c_number'>[5+0.212*3*[1+ [SF_3 * SF_4]]]</text> arrows

skills.name: Caltrops
skills.desc: <text class='c_label'>Charges:</text> <text class='c_resource'>2</text></br><text class='c_label'>Charge Cooldown:</text> <text class='c_resource'>12</text> seconds </br>ifADVANCED_TOOLTIP<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit Chance: </text><text class='c_resource'>25%</text></br>Leap backwards and throw caltrops on the ground, dealing <text class='c_number'>[0.3 * (1 + (0.1 * sLevel))]</text> damage and Slowing enemies by <text class='c_number'>[[1-(Pow(1-0.5, (1 + (0.1 * sLevel))))]*100]%</text>. Lasts <text class='c_number'>6</text> seconds.

skills.name: Poison Trap
skills.desc: <text class='c_label'>Cooldown:</text> <text class='c_resource'>10</text> seconds</br>ifADVANCED_TOOLTIP<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit Chance: </text><text class='c_resource'>20%</text></br>Place a trap that arms after <text class='c_number'>([1.25 - Trap_Arm_Time_Reduction_Seconds] > 0.25) ? [1.25 - Trap_Arm_Time_Reduction_Seconds] : 0.25</text> seconds. It activates when an enemy moves within range, applying <text class='c_number'>[[0.0956 * (1 + (0.1 * sLevel))]*9/0.25]</text> Poisoning damage over <text class='c_number'>9</text> seconds to enemies in the area.</br></br>You can have <text class='c_number'>200</text> armed traps out at once.

skills.name: Concealment
skills.desc: <text class='c_label'>Cooldown:</text> <text class='c_resource'>[20 * ((cdr[sLevel])]</text> seconds</br>Vanish from sight, gaining an advanced form of <text class='c_important'><u>Stealth</u></text> for <text class='c_number'>4</text> seconds that will not be removed by taking damage. </br></br><text class='c_important'>Concealment</text> also makes you <text class='c_important'><u>Unstoppable</u></text>, grants <text class='c_number'>30%</text> Movement Speed, and allows you to move freely through enemies for its duration.</br></br>Using an attack Skill during <text class='c_important'>Concealment</text> will break <text class='c_important'>Concealment</text>.

skills.name: Poison Imbuement
skills.desc: <text class='c_label'>Cooldown:</text> <text class='c_resource'>13</text> seconds</br>ifADVANCED_TOOLTIP<text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit Chance: </text><text class='c_resource'>33%</text></br>Imbue your weapons with lethal poison. Your next <text class='c_number'>2</text> <text class='c_important'>Imbueable</text> Skills deal Poison damage and apply <text class='c_number'>[[(1 * (1 + (0.1 * sLevel)))*(1+Imbued_Skill_Strength_Percent_Bonus)]*100/5*[5+(Mod.Duration*1)]]%</text> of their Base damage as additional Poisoning damage over <text class='c_number'>[5+(Mod.Duration*1)]</text> seconds.

equipment.name: Fur-Lined Hood
affixes: +0.01 Life Regeneration while Not Damaged Recently

equipment.name: Adventurer's Tunic
affixes: While you have a <text class='c_important'><u>Barrier</u></text> active, there is a <text class='c_random'>8%</text> chance to ignore incoming direct damage from Distant enemies.

equipment.name: War Crossbow
affixes: <text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit:</text> Up to a +1.8% Chance to Execute Injured Non-Elites

equipment.name: Falchion
affixes: <text class='c_label'>Lucky Hit:</text> Up to a +1.8% Chance to Execute Injured Non-Elites

equipment.name: Adventurer's Gloves
affixes: <text class='c_gold'>Lucky Hit:</text> Making an enemy <text class='c_important'><u>Vulnerable</u></text> has up to a <text class='c_random'>42%</text> chance to grant <text class='c_number'>3%</text> increased Critical Strike Chance for <text class='c_number'>3</text> seconds, up to <text class='c_number'>9%</text>.

equipment.name: Vigo's Protecting Amulet
affixes: When hit while not <text class='c_important'><u>Healthy</u></text>, a magical bubble is summoned around you for <text class='c_random'>3.5</text> seconds. While standing in the bubble players are <text class='c_important'><u>Immune</u></text>. Can only occur once every <text class='c_number'>90</text> seconds.
